Twinned Spell.name: Twinned Spell
Twinned Spell.flavor: The magic loosed by your last attack lingers, letting you recall it and use it again.
Twinned Spell.trigger: You hit or miss with an arcane at-will attack power, or you hit no targets with a melee or ranged arcane encounter attack power.
Twinned Spell.effect: You regain the use of and immediately use the triggering power.

Resourceful Trick.name: Resourceful Trick
Resourceful Trick.flavor: You always have the right spell up your sleeve.
keywords: Arcane, Cold, Fire, Force, Implement, Lightning, Thunder
Resourceful Trick.onHit: 3d10 + Charisma modifier cold, fire, force, lightning, or thunder damage, or 2d10 + Charisma modifier damage if you attacked two targets.
Resourceful Trick.effect: Choose one of the following: Slide the target 2 squares, push or pull the target 4 squares, daze the target until the end of your next turn, or swap places with the target (this power gains the teleport keyword).

Spontaneous Action.name: Spontaneous Action
Spontaneous Action.flavor: You apprehend the arcane energies swirling about you and fashion them into new opportunities.
Spontaneous Action.target: You and one ally in the burst
Spontaneous Action.effect: You and the ally each take a move action as a free action.
